t: Corkboard Concepts helps Rohrich lift car sales | Amazon Ads
s: March 31, 2025 - The campaign clearly demonstrated the impact that the brand can have on both reach and sales by expanding their strategy to include Sponsored TV. Thanks to Rohrich’s results, Corkboard Concepts quickly shifted more of their clients’ advertising budgets to Amazon DSP and Sponsored TV.
